Kim Yong Dae meets British Ambassador
    Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Dae, chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party, today met and had a talk with David Arthur Slinn, new British Ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him.
